mapper.select: select dl.diagnostic_list_id, dl.diagnostic_list_barcode, dl.diagnostic_list_state, dl.diagnostic_specimen_number, dl.receipt_id, dl.staff_id, dl.staff_name, s.search_id, s.symptom_id, b.bundle_id, b.bundle_name, b.bundle_specimen, b.bundle_bottle, b.bundle_lab from diagnostic_lists as dl, searchs as s, bundles as b where dl.receipt_id = #{receiptId} and dl.search_id = s.search_id and s.bundle_id = b.bundle_id

select p.patient_id, p.patient_name, dl.diagnostic_list_id, dl.diagnostic_list_barcode, dl.diagnostic_list_state, dl.diagnostic_specimen_number, dl.staff_id, dl.search_id, dl.staff_name, dl.diagnostic_result_state, rao.receipt_id, date_format(rao.receipt_datetime, '%y-%m-%d') as receipt_datetime, rao.receipt_result_state from receipt_and_opinions rao, patients p, diagnostic_lists dl where rao.patient_id = p.patient_id and dl.receipt_id = rao.receipt_id and rao.receipt_datetime Like CONCAT('%', #{receipt_datetime}, '%') and dl.diagnostic_specimen_number != '' and dl.diagnostic_specimen_number is not null

select p.patient_id, p.patient_name, dl.diagnostic_list_id, dl.diagnostic_list_barcode, dl.diagnostic_list_state, dl.diagnostic_specimen_number, dl.staff_id, dl.search_id, dl.staff_name, dl.diagnostic_result_state, rao.receipt_id, date_format(rao.receipt_datetime, '%y-%m-%d') as receipt_datetime, rao.receipt_result_state from receipt_and_opinions rao, patients p, diagnostic_lists dl where rao.patient_id = p.patient_id and dl.receipt_id = rao.receipt_id and p.patient_name Like CONCAT('%', #{patient_name}, '%') and rao.receipt_datetime Like CONCAT('%', #{receipt_datetime}, '%') and dl.diagnostic_specimen_number != '' and dl.diagnostic_specimen_number is not null

select distinct rao.receipt_id, date_format(rao.receipt_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d') as receipt_datetime, p.patient_name, s.symptom_name, p.patient_sex, substring(p.patient_ssn,1,6) as ssn, date_format(rao.receipt_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d') as blood_datetime from patients p, receipt_and_opinions rao, diagnostic_lists dl, searchs s where p.patient_id = rao.patient_id and rao.receipt_id = dl.receipt_id and dl.search_id = s.search_id and rao.receipt_id='100007';

select p.patient_id, p.patient_name, dl.diagnostic_list_id, dl.diagnostic_list_barcode, dl.diagnostic_list_state, dl.diagnostic_specimen_number, dl.staff_id, dl.search_id, dl.staff_name, dl.diagnostic_result_state, rao.receipt_id, date_format(rao.receipt_datetime, '%y-%m-%d') as receipt_datetime, rao.receipt_result_state from receipt_and_opinions rao, patients p, diagnostic_lists dl where rao.patient_id = p.patient_id and dl.receipt_id = rao.receipt_id and dl.diagnostic_specimen_number = #{diagnostic_specimen_number}
